TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowServiceHost extends System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase

summary.span: 為工作流程提供主機。

span.span: Provides a host for workflows.

summary.span: 支援傳訊活動、建立多個執行個體及組態等功能。

span.span: Supports features like messaging activities, multi-instancing, and configuration.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 關閉作業必須在逾時前完成的時間間隔。

span.span: The period of time the close operation has to complete before timing out.

summary.span: 關閉裝載的服務，包括通道發送器以及相關聯的執行個體內容和接聽程式。

span.span: Closes down the hosted service, including the channel dispatchers and associated instance contexts and listeners.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫 時，工作流程執行階段會嘗試持續任何裝載的工作流程，但在這個案例中不保證持續性。The workflow runtime will try to persist any hosted workflow when is called, but persistence is not guaranteed in this scenario. 如果要裝載重要商務資料，執行個體應經常保存 (例如，在每次 Send 作業或時間間隔之後) 以確保資料未遺失。If important business data is being hosted, the instances should persist frequently (such as after each Send operation, or after an interval of time) to ensure that data is not lost.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何將延伸加入至工作流程服務主機。The following example shows how to add an extension to the workflow service host.
